subject: Re: Looking for OJT in San Diego
author: M.A. Coletta (Mike)
full_text:
Hi LC,

Thanks!  I sent one Gabs way, but I still have the one with the 
wires.  I'm still testing it every once in awhile too.
I need more time on it though to see if it's worth the build.

-Mike

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "LC Duplatt" <lcdupla@...> wrote:
>
> Hey, Mike C...heard your interview on Glimpse Through the Veil with 
> Gab...nice job, buddy!  Loved the cemetery note story...just 
> brilliant!
> 
> How's that little chamber do-hicky working for you, btw? ;)
> 
> LC
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta (Mike)" 
> <michaelcoletta@> wrote:
> >
> > Hi Ron,
> > 
> > Hopefully your sister has received the radio already.  It got 
> shipped 
> > priority mail.  Have fun with it.  I really like the way the FM 
> scan 
> > rate is....
> > 
> > - Mike
> > 
> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Ron Lederer <ronriko@> wrote:
> > >
> > > I will be traveling to San Diego from Mexico to visit my sister 
> and 
> > pick up the RS 125 Mike is sending me.  I will be in the San 
Diego 
> > and El Centro area from Feb 15 to 19 and I would love to be able 
to 
> > meet-up with someone from the area who has experience with EVP 
> > technology.  Mike is sending a box already hacked so we can work 
> with 
> > the box and hopefully get something recorded.  Since I have 
little 
> > experience as a newbie to this, I would love to see how someone 
> puts 
> > all of it together...recording, analyzing, etc.  
> > >    
> > >   If you have the time and are willing to give a little on-the-
> job 
> > training, please let me know by email.  By the way, in mid June I 
> > will be traveling from Penn. to NC for two weeks and would love 
to 
> > get together with folks over in that area.  I will probably be 
> > ordering a mini-box to be sent to my folks house in Allentown, so 
I 
> > will have that to play with.  Let me know.  Ron Lederer
> > > 
> > >        
> > > ---------------------------------
> > > Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
> > >
> >
>
